mechanics.condition: Target visible within range AND Target fails Charisma Saving Throw
mechanics.outcome: Target is banished from current plane

mechanics.condition: Target is native to the current plane
mechanics.outcome: Target is sent to a harmless demiplane AND Target is Incapacitated while in demiplane

mechanics.condition: Target is NOT native to the current plane
mechanics.outcome: Target is sent to its home plane

mechanics.condition: Target was banished AND Target is native to the current plane
mechanics.outcome: Target reappears in the space it left or nearest unoccupied space

mechanics.condition: Target was banished AND Target is NOT native to the current plane AND Spell duration was LESS THAN 1 minute
mechanics.outcome: Target reappears in the space it left or nearest unoccupied space

mechanics.condition: Target was banished AND Target is NOT native to the current plane AND Spell duration was AT LEAST 1 minute
mechanics.outcome: Target does NOT return to the current plane

description_text: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence. The target must succeed on a charisma saving throw or be banished.If the target is native to the plane of existence you're on, you banish the target to a harmless demiplane. While there, the target is incapacitated. The target remains there until the spell ends, at which point the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.If the target is native to a different plane of existence than the one you're on, the target is banished with a faint popping noise, returning to its home plane. If the spell ends before 1 minute has passed, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied. Otherwise, the target doesn't return.
